channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Roadwork barriers left for many months, 20th September
item.description:
Three roadwork barriers that have been here for many months Have just been moved off the grass and onto the pavement by concerned resident

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Somerset Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Vegetation at side of road encroaching on road, 20th September
item.description:
The bushes and trees have grown into the road making the lane very narrow and buses and trucks therefore have to go over to the other lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 287 London Road, Charlton Kings

item.title: Drain blockage, 20th September
item.description:
The drain outside of number 21 whaddon avenue is clogged. Someone threw a cigarette butt into it and it started a small fire. I soaked it in water of course, but in truth the drain could do with a good flushing out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Whaddon Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reoccurring potholes, 20th September
item.description:
The potholes along this stretch of the road are frequently and inadequately patched. There is another one or 2 that have developed. This could do with a better patch with the winter months approaching when this part of the road will have more instances of not fixed correctly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Walnuts GLOUCESTER, Tredington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road between High Cross and Slutswell in terrible shape, 17th September
item.description:
The whole section is pitted with potholes and a broken road surface which for a major cycling route is extremely dangerous. This section is long overdue for repair having been in this state for a few years
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone

item.title: Effluent from car wash pooling in gutter, 16th September
item.description:
Julian hand car wash on Swindon Road Cheltenham does not have sufficient drainage so effluent drains out onto the pavement and into the gutter where it pools into large puddles. There is a danger of being splashed in this effluent by passing traffic if you are using this part of the pavement. I fear this may turn icy in the winter causing a slip hazard also. I personally avoid this part of the pavement or change my route to avoid the possibility of being splashed in cleaning chemicals and god knows what else. I have reported this problem to Cheltenham borough council and the environment agency before but neither is interested saying its " Not their problem".
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obscured signs, 16th September
item.description:
Sequence of signs obscured by trees causing dangerous late lane changes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Colwell Avenue, Hucclecote

item.title: Newly fixed lighting on Evington Road carpark now broken, 16th September
item.description:
I believe that this lighting is the responsibility of the council, the borough council and perhaps a circuit breaker has flicked? Either way the new lighting is not working

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Hamlet Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
